    • Method Detail

      • prepareData

        public void prepareData()
        Prepares data from the BufferedReader. On BufferedReader line 3: generates parties and candidates from [Candidate,Party],.... format On BufferedReader line 4: sets the available seats to win. On BufferedReader line 6+: counts the ballot and updates the data stored in partyList.
        Specified by:
        prepareData in class Election

        public void allocateSeats(java.util.ArrayList<Party> partyLst)
